mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_LOG (REQ_ID, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')
INSERT INTO MEMO_LOG (REQ_ID, MEMO_IDX, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${memo_idx}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')
INSERT INTO CALENDER_LOG (REQ_ID, CALENDER_IDX, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${calender_idx}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')
INSERT INTO ROUTINE_LOG (REQ_ID, ROUTINE_IDX, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${routine_idx}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')
INSERT INTO GROUP_LOG (REQ_ID, GROUP_IDX, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${group_idx}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')

INSERT INTO ETC_LOG (REQ_ID, TARGET_IDX, TARGET_TYPE, USER_IDX, API_URL, REQ_DATA, SESSION_ID) VALUES ('${req_id}', '${target_idx}', '${target_type}', '${user_idx}', '${api_url}', '${req_data}' ,'${session_id}')
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
UPDATE MEMO_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
UPDATE CALENDER_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
UPDATE ROUTINE_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
UPDATE GROUP_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
UPDATE ETC_LOG SET RES_DATA = '${res_data}', STATUS = '${status}', RES_STATUS = '${res_status}', MSG = '${msg}', ERR_CODE = '${err_code}', END_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REQ_ID = '${req_id}'
